Our Super Bowl Watch Party bar in Miami is the perfect place to cheer on your favorite team or simply enjoying the excitement of the event. If you looking for where to watch the Super Bowl in Miami , look no further.  With a great selection of drinks and food, plus big screens showing all the action, Grails is the perfect place to enjoy the 2024 Super Bowl. So whether you're a casual fan or a die-hard NFL football enthusiast, make sure to stop by Grails for our Super Bowl LVIII Watch Party in Miami. Commonly asked Super Bowl Party Questions: Where to watch the Super Bowl in Miami? With over 70 TVs, two bars, and 3 spacious seating areas, Grails in Wynwood is the best place to watch the Super Bowl in Miami. Where is the best Super Bowl Watch Party in Miami? If you're looking for a Super Bowl watch party, there is no better bar than Grails in Miami's Wynwood area. Grails is a massive sports bar and restaurant with TVs everywhere and seating that spans both inside and outside. Grails 2024 Super Bowl watch party in Miami is the best way to take in the big game. Where can I make a reservation to watch the Super Bowl? If you'd like to reserve a table to ensure you can watch the Super Bowl at Grails, reservations are available. Big groups are always welcome! Is Grails' Super Bowl Watch Party close to Brickell, Downtown Miami, Miami Beach, South Beach, and Coral Gables? If you're not located in Wynwood and are looking to enjoy the Super Bowl Watch Party at Grails Sports Bar, we are within minutes of Brickell, Downtown Miami, Miami Beach, South Beach, and Coral Gables. Are there any Super Bowl Events in Wynwood? Grails will start Super Bowl Sunday with our signature 'tailgate' brunch. Later, join us for our pep-rally, where everything is 50% off. Finally, we'll wrap up our events with the Super Bowl and the Super Bowl afterparty. About Grails Located in Wynwood, Miami, Grails is more than your average sports bar -- it's an experience. Grails brings together hyper-local beers, hand-crafted cocktails (by world-class mixologists), and unique shareable dishes, all packed inside a fun and welcoming atmosphere. The Grails Experience takes place in 2 parts -- an indoor "sneaker-themed" sports lounge decked out with one-of-a-kind art pieces and rare sneakers on display, as well as a colorful, spacious outdoor "Miami Vice" patio. Whether dining inside or outside, you'll have your sights set on one of our 70+ TVs. Grails is the perfect location for families, large parties, or a get-together with your close friends with plentiful space and many shareable drinks and dishes. Be sure to check out our happy hour for discounts on our most popular items!
